Uses of Interface
io.smudgr.extensions.automate.controls.AutomatorControl

  • Packages that use AutomatorControl 
    Package Description
    io.smudgr.app  
    io.smudgr.extensions.automate  
    io.smudgr.extensions.automate.controls  

    • Uses of AutomatorControl in io.smudgr.app

      Methods in io.smudgr.app that return AutomatorControl 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AutomatorControl AppStart.addAutomator(java.lang.String type, Parameter param)
      Add an automator to the project of given type for given Parameter

    • Uses of AutomatorControl in io.smudgr.extensions.automate

      Methods in io.smudgr.extensions.automate that return AutomatorControl 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AutomatorControl AutomatorExtension.add(PropertyMap state)

    • Uses of AutomatorControl in io.smudgr.extensions.automate.controls

      Classes in io.smudgr.extensions.automate.controls that implement AutomatorControl 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BeatAutomator
      The BeatAutomator synchronizes with the current Project.getBPM() to adjust a NumberParameter value in sync with the beat.
      class  DownsampleAutomator
      The DownsampleAutomator will downsample the current Rack according to the current application FPS, to try an achieve the Controller.TARGET_FPS.
      class  EasingAutomator
      The EasingAutomator attempts to smoothen sharp value changes by easing into a base state after user interaction.
      class  StepAutomator
      The StepAutomator simply changes a NumberParameter by it's NumberParameter.getStep() every tick.
